Wisdom: لَا تَعُدَّنَّ خَيْراً مَا أَدْرَكْتَ بِهِ شَرّاً
enWisdom: Never count as good that by which you attain evil

Wisdom: افْعَلِ الْخَيْرَ وَلَا تَفْعَلِ الشَّرَّ فَخَيْرٌ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ مَنْ يَفْعَلُهُ وَشَرٌّ مِنَ الشَّرِّ مَنْ يَأْتِيهِ بِفِعْلِهِ
enWisdom: Do good and do not commit evil acts, for the one who performs a good deed is better than it and the one who commits an evil act is more evil than it

Wisdom: أَلَا إِنَّ أَبْصَرَ الْأَبْصَارِ مَنْ نَفَذَ فِي الْخَيْرِ طَرْفُهُ
enWisdom: Indeed, the most perceptive of seers is one whose gaze penetrates into good actions
The most enviable person is the one who rushes to perform good deeds
The person who gains the most felicity from [that which is] good is the one who acts upon it
When you witness [a] good [deed] then take to it

Wisdom: إِذَا رَأَيْتُمُ الْخَيْرَ فَسَارَعْتُمْ إِلَيْهِ وَرَأَيْتُمُ الشَّرَّ فَتَبَاعَدْتُمْ عَنْهُ وَكُنْتُمْ بِالطَّاعَاتِ عَامِلِينَ وَفِي الْمَكَارِمِ مُتَنَافِسِينَ كُنْتُمْ مُحْسِنِينَ فَائِزِينَ
enWisdom: If you rush towards good whenever you see it, distance yourself from evil when you see it, act obediently [upon the commandments of Allah] and vie to acquire noble traits, then you are righteous and successful
Expediting good turns is the basis of righteousness
He who seeks good will triumph by it

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِأَعْمَالِ الْخَيْرِ فَتَبَادَرُوهَا وَلَا يَكُنْ غَيْرُكُمْ أَحَقَّ بِهَا مِنْكُمْ
enWisdom: You must perform virtuous actions and hasten towards them, and let not others become more worthy of them than you
It is enough of a righteous act to have a good habit

Wisdom: لَأَنْ تَكُونَ تَابِعاً فِي الْخَيْرِ خَيْرٌ لَكَ مِنْ أَنْ تَكُونَ مَتْبُوعاً فِي الشَّرِّ
enWisdom: Indeed, being a follower in good is [much] better for you than being a leader in evil
One who does good has [actually] started with [gaining its benefit] himself
The essential prerequisite of good action is taking the initiative in [performing] it

Wisdom: لَا يَقُولَنَّ أَحَدُكُمْ إِنَّ أَحَداً أَوْلَى بِفِعْلِ الْخَيْرِ مِنِّي فَيَكُونَ وَاللَّهِ كَذَلِكَ إِنَّ لِلْخَيْرِ وَالشَّرِّ أَهْلًا فَمَهْمَا تَرَكْتُمُوهُ كَفَاكُمُوهُ أَهْلُهُ
enWisdom: None of you should ever say: ‘indeed there is one who is more worthy of doing the good action than me,’ for it will, by Allah, become that wayVerily for good and evil there are adherents, so whenever you leave it, its adherents perform it in your place

Wisdom: اطْلُبُوا الْخَيْرَ فِي أَخْفَافِ الْإِبِلِ طَارِدَةً وَوَارِدَةً
enWisdom: Seek goodness in the hoofs of the camel when driven away and when coming back
